attributes.action: provide financial assistance to help the middle class leave the country and resettle somewhere less fiscally punitive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again the middle class is being called on to bail out the finances of a Labour government. Given that the Labour government refuses to call a general election, we ask that the Government provide financial assistance so the middle class can emigrate to a country that is less eager to tax it into oblivion.
